title: Base Envelope

schemaVersion.description: The version of the schema being used for this message

messageId.description: A unique identifier for the message, formatted as a UUID

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the message was published, in ISO 8601 format

gatewayId.description: The identifier of the gateway that published the message

messageType.description: The type of message being sent, such as telemetry, command, or event

payload.description: The actual data being sent in the message, which can vary based on the message type

description: Base envelope schema for messages in the system, providing a standard structure for all messages.
